Title: Guarded Appreciation
Description:
I know it can be quite exhausting work to defend such an important locale. And often, we drakonids and dragonspawn get very little thanks for our dedication.

I wish to bestow some of my own appreciation to the guards here in Ancient Bough.

Here, offer them these gifts from me, as a sign of friendship. I hope my heartfelt gesture properly expresses my gratitude.

Objectives.Text: Give Rymek's Gift to Emerald Guards
